answers.answer: I'm due April 9th and pregnant with Fraternal twins.  I wasn't told I have to be extra careful though. They said the risk for preterm labor is higher with twins but there isn't anything I can do to prevent that besides the normal pregnancy dos and donts.  After 20 weeks I will have to go in every 4 weeks for an ultrasound to check their growth,  position,  cervix, etc. And the risk of gestational diabetes and hypertension is higher in pregnant gals but other than that I haven't been doing anything different this pregnancy than I did with first baby.
Oh and I'm 29 too! And congratulations!
At my clinic. They automatically consider all multiple pregnancy as high risk. Having two boys ^.^

I have fraternal twins. ^^ My twin pregnancy was high-risk, but NOT ALL are. They let you know if yours is. My advice is not to do too much. By you not being that far along, you should be able to carry on with your regular routine, unless you're having complications. Congratulations!!
So many twin mammas.  How exciting! !  R ur twins fraternal or identical?

Weird question but I'll be 7 wks tomorrow and everyone is telling me im having twins. I'm so big look like im about 4-5 months.  When I tell them im due May 11th they look at me funny. So my question is are you bigger then most women having one?
You might just be bloated.  Unless you've had an ultrasound that shows twins, you won't know for sure

question: I need a helping hand im told i must be extra careful and im not sure how. Im 29yrs and having twins. Im due 28 March 2015.
title: any one expecting twins or with twins.
